price: Isaaniif ishee keessatti fuduraaleetu jira. Wanti isaan yaammatan hunduu isaaniif jira.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
